attributes.action: A public vote of no confidence in the Prime Minister
attributes.additional_details:
She has made a pigs ear of Brexit. Saying a no deal is better than a bad deal. Any deal put forward is a bad deal! The only option is no deal. 

She is not fit to lead a pub crawl let alone a country
attributes.background: The Prime Minister has survived a vote of no confidence from her own party and parliament. But we the people demand the Prime Minister resign with immediate effect.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions that call for someone to lose their job. This includes government Ministers.
